entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 7:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: S 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
